summary: Replace the title music with music I composed.
descriptionHtml:
Replace the title screen music with a song I composed a few years ago. I was playing Morrowind and listening to a lot of Jeremy Soule. 

It\'s all done through midi and samples, which gives it a thin sound, but I can\'t afford to hire an orchestra and recording studio!

DEMO: http://www.4shared.com/mp3/p9TJSo9B/katanalevyTheme.html

INSTALL:
Extract the .rar to the data folder in your Skyrim directory. 

UNINSTALL:
Delete or replace the \"mus_maintheme.xwm\" file in the Skyrim>Data>music>special directory.

C&C are welcome, but if you don\'t like it, then uninstall it! :-)
author: Katanalevy
